description: Their most durable waterproof mittens.<br><br>These rugged mittens are made for demanding alpine climbing but work perfectly for all-season mountaineering adventures and expeditions.<br><br>They are made in premium GORE-TEX® PRO fabric, and we use this because it’s the world-leading quality for durable waterproofness (28,000mm), optimized breathability, and total windproofness. Premium Pittard goat skin ensures grip and comfort.<br><br>The main fabric is a 3L 70D GORE-TEX® PRO most rugged fabric (RET less than 9) with a 100% recycled nylon face. This ensures durable, reliable weather protection and optimized breathability at a lower weight, perfect for active movement. The long-lasting Pittards Armortan goat leather in the palm and thumb gives great grip.<br><br>Key features include: Pulling strap in the cuff, elastic one hand closure system, lightweight wrist tightening, and elastic gloves leash.<br><br>The gloves are medium long.
name: Trollveggen GTX Pro Mittens
